entry.title: Driftwood
entry.summary:
The Landing.

"As the Mothership touches down, ever so gently, so as to not to melt the glacier's surface, I imagine the brutes of this world gaze, at our splendor with awe and fright."

The Planet of Eternal Winter

entry.content:
The Landing.

"As the Mothership touches down, ever so gently, so as to not to melt the glacier's surface, I imagine the brutes of this world gaze, at our splendor with awe and fright."

The Planet of Eternal Winter

I was recovering from my fatigue in my chambers when I frist sensed the excitement in the atmosphere. The Deeper Circle must have been keen on landing on this icy shard of a terra nova, gaining the support of everyone on the Mothership; or might this be something else? Everyone is excited about something around the same time, but maybe I'm over-thinking about it. I need to rest, keep monitoring my stats and get upto an optimal level, across the board. . .

.
